0.text: Innate: Kennen's abilities apply a stack of Mark of the Storm to enemies hit for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times.
0.html: Innate: Kennen's abilities apply a stack of Mark of the Storm to enemies hit for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times.

1.text: The third stack against a target consumes them all to  stun them for 1.25 seconds and restore  25 energy. The stun duration is reduced to 0.5 seconds if this occurs on the same target again within 6 seconds.
1.html: The third stack against a target consumes them all to stun them for 1.25 seconds and restore  25 energy. The stun duration is reduced to 0.5 seconds if this occurs on the same target again within 6 seconds.
markedPassages: stun
25 energy

2.text: Slicing Maelstrom can apply only up to 3 stacks on a target.
2.html: Slicing Maelstrom can apply only up to 3 stacks on a target.
markedPassages: Slicing Maelstrom
possibleConcerningAbilities: Slicing Maelstrom can apply only up to 3 stacks on a target.

0.text: Active: Kennen throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Kennen throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

0.text: Passive: Kennen's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Electrical Surge, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of  Mark of the Storm.
0.html: Passive: Kennen's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Electrical Surge, stacking up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Mark of the Storm.
markedPassages: Mark of the Storm

1.text: Active: Kennen sends out a surge of electricity that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies afflicted by  Mark of the Storm or within  Slicing Maelstrom.
1.html: Active: Kennen sends out a surge of electricity that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies afflicted by Mark of the Storm or within Slicing Maelstrom.
markedPassages: Mark of the Storm
Slicing Maelstrom

2.text: An enemy within  775 units with  Mark of the Storm or inside  Slicing Maelstrom is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be targeted by this ability.
2.html: An enemy within 775 units with Mark of the Storm or inside Slicing Maelstrom is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be targeted by this ability.
markedPassages: Mark of the Storm
Slicing Maelstrom
visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: An enemy within  775 units with  Mark of the Storm or inside  Slicing Maelstrom is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be targeted by this ability.

0.text: Active: Kennen turns into lightning for 2 seconds, becoming unable to declare basic attacks but gaining  ghosting and  100% bonus movement speed. He deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores  40 energy upon damaging at least one enemy.
0.html: Active: Kennen turns into lightning for 2 seconds, becoming unable to declare basic attacks but gaining ghosting and  100% bonus movement speed. He deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores  40 energy upon damaging at least one enemy.
markedPassages: ghosting
100% bonus movement speed
40 energy

1.text: Lightning Rush can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration.
1.html: Lightning Rush can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration.

2.text: Recast: Kennen ends Lightning Rush to gain  bonus attack speed and be allowed to exceed the attack speed cap for 4 seconds.
2.html: Recast: Kennen ends Lightning Rush to gain  bonus attack speed and be allowed to exceed the attack speed cap for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

3.text: Lightning Rush's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
3.html: Lightning Rush's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Lightning Rush's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

0.text: Active: Kennen summons a storm around himself for 3 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for the duration.

markedPassages: bonus armor
bonus magic resistance

1.text: The storm strikes lightning bolts down on nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds, each one dealing magic damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
